name: Aqua Grand Plus

stagesOfPurification.Pre-Sediment Filter: Removes large particles like sand, dirt, and rust.

stagesOfPurification.Activated Carbon Filter: Adsorbs chlorine, bad taste, odor, color, and organic impurities.

stagesOfPurification.Sediment Filter: Further removes finer particles and impurities.

stagesOfPurification.RO Membrane: Removes dissolved salts, heavy metals, and other impurities.

stagesOfPurification.UV Chamber: Kills bacteria, viruses, and other pathogens.

stagesOfPurification.Post-Activated Carbon Filter: Enhances the taste of the purified water.

stagesOfPurification.TDS Controller: Maintains essential natural minerals in the water.

specifications.purificationCapacity: Typically around 12-15 liters per hour (based on standard household RO systems).
specifications.filterChange: Filters need to be replaced in a year.

benefits: 100% Water Purification: Ensures that the water is free from all types of impurities, including dissolved salts, chemicals, and microorganisms.
Multi-Stage Purification: Provides comprehensive purification through multiple stages, ensuring water safety and quality.
Enhanced Taste: The post-carbon filter and TDS controller help retain essential minerals and improve the taste of the water.
Health Benefits: Eliminates harmful bacteria and viruses, reducing the risk of waterborne diseases.
User Convenience: The filter change ensures timely maintenance and a continuous supply of pure water.
Versatility: Suitable for homes, offices, and small businesses due to its efficient and reliable purification process.
Eco-Friendly: Reduces the need for bottled water, thereby minimizing plastic waste.
